messages.content: What is the purpose of the comfyui_dagthomas custom node SDXL Auto Prompter?
The SDXL Auto Prompter provides easy prompting for generating endless random art pieces and photographs.
How can I customize the subject input field in the SDXL Auto Prompter?
You can change the subject input field by adding your preferred style or Lora to overwrite predefined subjects like 'man, woman ...'.
Does the SDXL Auto Prompter support custom styles or Lora for the subject input field?
Yes, the SDXL Auto Prompter supports custom styles or Lora for the subject input field, enabling personalization.
